title: First in line
description: Sort the name of the students in alphabetical order - but from Z-A.
data:
const arr = [
  "Yelp",
  "Zipp It",
  "Grobo",
  "Aslan The Lion",
  "Flipper",
  "Questions Guy",
  "Besserwisser"
];

clues.title: Clue
clues.clue: It is possible to solve this challenge with one super short line of code - don't overthink it.
